cursor.description: A pagination cursor that represents a position in the dataset. If given, results will be returned from the item after the cursor. If not given, results will be returned from the beginning.
cursor.name: cursor

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return in the response. If maximum is exceeded, maximum is used.
limit.name: limit

hasPrivatePlanOption.description: If the product has a private plan option.

industries.description: The list of industries associated to the product.

lifecycleState.description: The lifecycle state of the product.

offerType.description: The offer type of a product reflecting the business model.

summary.description: The short summary of the product.

supportPhone.description: The phone number for support inquiries.

vendorTerms.description: The list of terms of use.

error.description: Reason phrase of the status code.

timeStamp.description: Timestamp at which the error occurred.

count.description: The number of items associated with this facet value.

version.description: Localized asset file name indexed by locale (en or de).

planId.description: The user-readable plan ID of a pricing option.

rate.description: The price of the product (per unit).

sku.description: The concrete variant of the product.

unit.description: The interval to which the rate applies.

highlightContent.example: This is the content of the best highlight ever,

parameters.description: A pagination cursor that represents a position in the dataset. If given, results will be returned from the item after the cursor. If not given, results will be returned from the beginning.
parameters.name: cursor

parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Filter the products based on attributes, e.g., `deliveryMethod eq "SAAS"`. The supported operators are:- `eq` (equal)- `co` (contains; `text co "searching"`)These expressions can be logically linked with `AND` and `OR`. Field names which can be used as filters are:- `text`- `deliveryMethod`- `categories`- `industries`- `vendor.name`- `pricingOptions.priceType`- `pricingOptions.pricingPlan`
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Sort the products based on attributes and order e.g. `name:asc`. Attributes with scalar types (`createdAt`) or keywords (`name`, `deliveryMethod`, `lifecycleState`, `vendor.name`) can be used as sort criteria. To set the sort order, append `asc` (ascending) or `desc` (descending) to the attribute, e.g. `name:asc`. To sort by multiple attributes, separate them with a comma. E.g `name:asc,price:desc`.
parameters.name: sort

get.description: Gives information about a publicly available product.

post.description: Create an inquiry to contact sales, become a vendor, request a private plan, register for testing, or suggest a product. Requests are limited to 10 per 5 minutes.
Get details about the requested subscription.

get.description: List all subscriptions of a project.
get.summary: List all subscriptions of a project.

post.description: Reject a subscription (in any lifecycle state). Only available for subscriptions to products with lifecycle state `PRODUCT_PREVIEW`.
